comment.author: 64555638@N00
comment._content: I've got some similar ones, also unidentified, but most likely related to me. Looks like the same man in both.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/eyelightfilms] Almost definitely (if that's not a contradiction in terms) the same man - very distinctive mouth.

You're very luck with the family photo archive you seem to have. Did you ever get on to the RDS about the equestrian photos?
